definition: to ache/to be sore/to feel painful
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: My muscles were sore because I had exercised too much.
sentences.chinese: 我因鍛鍊過度而肌肉發痛。

sentences.english: Then his chest began to hurt .
sentences.chinese: 然後他的胸部開始發痛。

sentences.english: He rubbed his aching legs with liniment.
sentences.chinese: 他用軟膏揉擦發痛的雙腿。

sentences.english: My throat huts . Id better gargle.
He bent over and rubbed his sore ankle.
sentences.chinese: 他彎下腰去揉搓發痛的腳踝。

sentences.english: That night, I cried until my chest ached .
sentences.chinese: 那一夜，我哭了很久，哭到胸口發痛。

sentences.english: I've been having pains in my chest recently.
sentences.chinese: 近來我的胸口一貫發痛。

sentences.english: Her brain and her heart ached.
sentences.chinese: 她的腦子和她的心都在發痛。

sentences.english: My eyes are sore from reading too much.
sentences.chinese: 我的眼睛由於看書多而發痛。

sentences.english: The universal stare made the eyes ache.
sentences.chinese: 這種普遍的耀眼的色彩令人眼睛發痛。

sentences.english: His ears and fingers stung with cold.
sentences.chinese: 他的耳朵和手指凍得發痛。
